notes: feminine noun; can mean 'pastry shop' or the pastry trade
example_sentence_english: I am going to the pastry shop.
I found a new pastry shop.
I visited some local pastry shops.

example_sentence_italian: Il profumo della pasticceria è invitante.
example_sentence_english: The smell of the pastry shop is inviting.
Let's go to the pastry shop.
I will deliver the flyers to the pastry shops.
I came from the pastry shop.
Orders come from the pastry shops.
I work in the pastry shop.
You cannot smoke in pastry shops.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto una recensione sulla pasticceria.
example_sentence_english: I read a review about the pastry shop.

example_sentence_italian: Ho dati sulle pasticcerie della città.
example_sentence_english: I have data about the city's pastry shops.

example_sentence_italian: Collaboriamo con la pasticceria del quartiere.
example_sentence_english: We collaborate with the neighborhood pastry shop.

example_sentence_italian: L'azienda lavora con le pasticcerie locali.
example_sentence_english: The company works with local pastry shops.
